response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which holds significant value for us at $12,000. Given its worth to you, I propose an offer to acquire it at a price of $10,000. This offers a fair compromise between the intrinsic value of the product and the price you would find reasonable. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if you require further discussion.", "product_price": 10000}
